metadata.title: CVE-2023-50966 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: erlang-jose (aka JOSE for Erlang and Elixir) through 1.11.6 allow attackersto cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a large p2c (aka PBES2Count) value in a JOSE header.

criterions.comment: erlang-jose package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
